segments.text: What a fun scene in this kitchen!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies from the jar; how sneaky and cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on that stool, stretching so high to get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's right there, all excited with her hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to share those treats, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is busy drying dishes, not even looking over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate so carefully with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running from the sink, but hey, it's just a little spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, but it adds to the playful chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks lovely and sunny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how oblivious the adult is to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies look delicious; wish I could have one too.
segments.speaker: PAR
